S.no.description: The unique identifier of each record.

State.description: The state name in India that the district belongs to.

Zone.description: The COVID-19 zone classification of the district (Red Zone, Green Zone).

value_dict.Red Zone: The district is currently experiencing a high number of COVID-19 cases.
value_dict.Green Zone: The district is currently experiencing a low number of COVID-19 cases.
value_dict.Orange Zone: The district is currently experiencing a moderate number of COVID-19 cases.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in public health data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the district and state in India, please predict the COVID-19 zone classification.
prompt.answer_prompt: Red Zone[0], Green Zone[1], or Orange Zone[2]?

class_value_dict.Red Zone: The district is currently experiencing a high number of COVID-19 cases.
class_value_dict.Green Zone: The district is currently experiencing a low number of COVID-19 cases.
class_value_dict.Orange Zone: The district is currently experiencing a moderate number of COVID-19 cases.
